column2: "Fwuahahahahaha! And you there, ARKS. Yes, you!"
"I can tell that something is troubling you just by looking at your face!"
"Rest assured, there is nothing to fear since I am here. Now, say what troubles you!"
"Hm? There is nothing troubling you? That's can't possibly be true... it is?"
"Wow, that made me look stupider than I expected. Time to change the subject!"
"Me? My name is Huey. I'm the sixth of the Council of Six, you know those elite members?"

"People tell me I don't act like it,
but it's not like there's anything they can do about it now, is there?"
"But what I do hasn't changed! I help people and I don't let them complain about it!"
"But you seem pretty capable. I hope I get a chance to run into you again!"
